trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Williamsport
There were no other sightings in Williamsport on or around August 11th 2013
Summary: A glowing fireball in the sky that looked like nothing else.
divs: sighting detailsi was walking to the local sunoco to buy cigarettes down warren avenue heading south and something caught my eye. i looked up into the sky and saw a (larger than an airplane)fireball looking sphere moving through the sky. i observed it for a little over two minutes. at first it appeared to be slowly moving north-east or ascending towards the north-east. after about a minute and a half it made a abruptly sharp turn towards the east. for about 10 seconds it headed east, slowly turning south-east and then it seemed to pick up speed and began to fade\disappear. 3. i wasn't sure what to think of it at first. 5. i was amazed with the object and stood in the same spot for 2 minutes to watch it, it kept my attention.
